metadata.title: CVE-2023-6481 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A serialization vulnerability in logback receiver component part of logbackversion 1.4.13, 1.3.13 and 1.2.12 allows an attacker to mount aDenial-Of-Service attack by sending poisoned data.

criterions.comment: logback: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
